tools.name: store_memory
tools.description: Store important information to long-term memory database. Use this to remember user preferences, facts, or any information that should persist across conversations.

content.description: The information to store in memory

api_config.note: Content with spaces will be automatically encoded by Claude

tools.name: search_memory
tools.description: Search for information in the long-term memory database. Use this to recall previously stored information.

query.description: Search query to find relevant memories (searches both keys and content)

tools.name: get_memory
tools.description: Get a specific memory by its key from the long-term memory database.

key.description: The unique key of the memory to retrieve

deployment: 2. Replace 'YOUR-APP-URL' with your deployment URL (without https://)
3. Copy JSON schema tool-by-tool to Claude settings
4. Test with URL in browser first
example_usage: User: 'Remember, I like coffee without sugar'
User: 'How do I drink my coffee?'
advantages: Works directly on Streamlit Cloud without extra configuration
Simple GET requests, easy to test directly in browser
No need to expose additional ports
